resources.string: Change one letter or scramble word
Are you sure you want to end this game?

\tWord Golf (more commonly known as Word Ladder) is a game invented by English writer Lewis Carroll. The objective is to change a word into another by changing one letter at a time, and ensuring that each iteration is a real word.
\tBefore playing, choose the length of the words you\'ll be using. Then, enter the starting word and the goal word.
\tDuring main gameplay, enter words that are one letter different from your current word. You can also scramble your word (i.e. pale -> leap). Go for a low amount of moves, or go for a fast time!
You can compete with friends in WordGolf. Decide on a start and goal word, hit "begin" at the same time, and compare scores/times!
